articles.title: Team USA shows flaws, holds on to beat Aussies - ESPN
articles.description: Team USA beat Australia 98-92 in an exhibition Monday at Etihad Arena, but a glaring weakness remained evident in the victory.
articles.content: ABU DHABI, United Arab Emirates -- For all the popularity of the 3-pointer, competitiveness in international basketball often comes down to the trenches. And in recent competitions, Team USA has lost… [+3553 chars]
